name: Oil Sprayer for Cooking Olive Oil Sprayer Mister for Air Fryer Vegetable Vinegar Oil Portable Mini Kitchen Gadgets for Baking,Salad,Grilling,BBQ,Roasting (2)
about_this_item: ✿ NEW DESIGN SPRAYER - The oil sprayer for cooking is a new design sprayer,it bring you new cooking experience.The olive oil sprayer will make a good control for oil and bring you a healthy life style.It is a practical kitchen gadgets.

✿ HEALTHY SPRAYER - The oil sprayer mister for air fryer is made of premium 304 stainless steel and food grade glass bottle. It adapt to people who would like to control oil on cooking.Fill it with your favorite oil and go out to grill.

✿ BETTER SPRAY - The cooking oil sprayer is perfect for oil,vinegar,cooking wine,vegetable oil,soy sauce,water,many kinds of oils.It is convenient for oil control.You can get better spray when cooking.
✿ EASY TO USE - The olive oil spray bottle is very easy to use.The new design on sprayer make you feel easy to cook.The new design is portable.You will love to cook with the sprayer.

✿ WIDELY APPLICATIONS - The oil mister spray bottle have widely applications such as cooking, frying, BBQ, Baking,Making salads.It will provide you best way to control oil.You can contact with us if any problem. ZEREOOY team will respond timely.

title: Works very well!
content: I have tried various other oil spray bottles and this one by far has worked the best. It has a nice spray to it. It does not just produce a solid stream/squirt of oil like so many others. It holds a nice amount and looks great sitting out. It's so easing to pull a spray the spatula or griddle to keep eggs from sticking. If you are in need of something like this I would definitely purchase this one.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: Doesn't eject a even mist. Part of the spray pattern is more like a stream.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023

content: Won't buy again.

title: They don't clog with vegetable oil.
content: I purchased these in April this year. One just quit working, so far the second is still spraying. Wish I'd saved my money.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: They work well, don't clog, easy to fill, come with a tiny funnel and a bottle cleaner. I'd buy again.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023

title: Great money saver and easy to use
content: I bought these bottles for evoo and canola oil.  They are a great money saving hack!  Instead of buying cooking spray you put your oil in these bottles and spray your food or pan.  They were a little tricky filling but not a problem because they came with a funnel to pour.  You just have to pour slowly when filling them.  They haven’t clogged had any issues.  I won’t be buying any more cooking spray.  These are perfect!  Well worth the money and a few minutes to fill the bottles.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Purchased for use with an air fryer-  bought two- one for olive oil, one for lighter vegetable oil-  4 months in-  olive oil bottle still spraying great, however the veg. Oil. Bottle has stopped spraying a nice wide mist and is just dribbling.  Conceptually, these are great-  when they work, they work great-  Wish there was a replacement sprayer attachment available.  Rating is due to the one which stopped working-  If they both were in operational order- I’d give 5 stars.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023

title: It’s fine
content: Like could I do the same thing with any left over spray bottle? Probably… the nozzle moves down & up when depressing the spray button which is weird.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: The volume of the spray is lower than expected. I had hoped to be able to spray my cooking pans with a light coating of oil vs pouring it in but the volume put out with a spray is insufficient to justify using it in that way. I do, however, like it for when an extra light coating is desired, such as on bread, etc.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023

title: It's just ok
content: It sprays a little harsher than the trigger models I’ve seen. Description says it’s glass but box says differently. Other than that it works fine and definitely cuts down on the oil I use especially for grilling
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: This is a pretty handy little product. It is on the small size & spritzes instead of sprays but is very handy if you need a light coating of oil. The funnels that are included, on the other hand, are way too small & useless, in my opinion. My daughter asked for this after using mine. She liked them so much.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023

title: Decent
content: Pump worked well but if bottle had indentations to hold it while spritzing that would be better. If a fine oil mist is needed, this does the job.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: Came back to buy more, everyone love them!

title: Handy
content: Bought this product to have better disbursement control of oil and vinegar when prepping my salad. However, the spray works perhaps a little too well. The spray range is very wide my balsamic  vinegar sprayed over my plate and beyond. Suffice to say, I didn’t see myself having to clean up every time after dressing my salads so I returned it.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: These have saved me so much money! No more buying aerosol cans of oil!! I loved them so much I bought my mom some and my mother in law. I use it daily when cooking. Great purchase & saves money$

title: Love These!

title: Verified Purchase
content: These were bad right out of the box, noticeably dirty and needed thorough cleaning before use. The design doesn't allow it to dry properly so even after drying for several days there was still water stuck inside that found its way into the oil I filled the bottles with, making it go rancid. The spray nozzle would randomly stop working during use. They barely lasted a week before one bottle broke at the threads during washing, leaving the broken threads just recessed enough in the sprayer that I couldn't remove them. The second bottle ejected the actual spray nozzle from the sprayer rendering it useless too.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023

title: Doesn’t spray evenly
content: They are great but would like some a little bigger , taller bottle.

title: Verified Purchase
content: Works great, looks great! Very happy. Bought some more for friends & family as gifts too.

Sprayer doesn't function after a week.
